body:
** Milestone 1: Done **
The first step in my blogging website project is done.

I was able to implement a Post/Feed functionality that allows you to write in one page and post it on another.

Next step is to create user profiles + authentication

** User Authentication using email and password is DONE **
Registered users data are saved in a database

Upon login, the db is searched for the entered email and password

if there's a match the user is logged in.

Next up, Registration page + User profiles (requires session)

** Registration page done! **
Just finished implementing a registration page.

It uses Regex to validate user input of username, email, and password.

User data is then inserted into the Users collection in the Blog database.

Next is implementing a 'session' mechanism that allows each user their own view of the website.

** Session + some UI work done **
Implemented a session mechanism that determines which user is sending requests.

Improved the UI look of the login page and fixing responsiveness of the app as a whole.

** Fixed Line break problem **
No more line breaks at the end of the message.
Currently workking on improving the UI as a whole and fixing the responsiveness
After that, creating user profiles, storing and displaying each message with user signature

** Working on profile **
Finished the edit pfp and edit cover functionality...that took longer than expected.
next will be adding a description
later on, adding user posts to profile by making a new Collection 'posts' (I really miss working on the backend...)

** Description: Done **
Adding/editing profile description is DONE.
Next thing is:
- Create collection for post.
- export old posts - as they are - to mongoDB using pandas lib
- Modify post data (remove title, add pfp, username, and date).
- Add like and dislike buttons? maybe??
- Add user posts to their profile.

** Modified posts in feed **
- Added post header (pfp, username, date)
- When user changes pfp, previous posts also update pfp
> Next: add user own posts to profile

** Main functionalities: Done **
- I can proudly say that I finished the blog's main functions. Users now can:
_Register Accounts.
_Login.
_Make posts with their attributes attached.
_Have a profile and customize it.

Next:
> users can delete/edit their previous posts through their profile (Gonna have to modify the posts collection).
> validate the cover and profile pictures sizes so they don't break the UI.
> test and discover bugs.
